markdownRemark.html:
A call for help. If you are able, please donate whatever you can spare to the victims of Ondoy(Ketsana).

I collected some details of donation centers and numbers but it pales in comparison to what other bloggers were able to post.

Please check the list of posts below:

  • Fashpack: typhoon ondoy rescue operations
  • conradmiguel: Bagyong Ondoy – Advisories, Photos, Videos, How to Donate, etc
  • yousaytoo: Typhoon Ondoy Emergency Hotlines & Relief Operations
  • nowieh08: cebuanos-lets-help-victims-of-ondoy
  • socialmediaphilippines: Manila Under Water – Barrio Bayanihan For Ondoy Victims
  • barriosiete: donate-for-ondoy-victims
  • blogherald: filipino-bloggers-vigilant-with-typhoon-ondoy-floods
  • herestolife:how-you-can-help-victims-of-tropical-storm-ketsanaondoy
  • gingerbreadrunning: no-laughing-matter-lets-help-ondoy
  • apolthegreat: typhoon-ondoy-flood-and-rescue-updates
  • pinaylighterside: help-typhoon-ondoy-victims
  • sourpolitics: typhoon-ondoy-emergency-hotlines-and-relief-operations
  • Market Manila. Thousands of Hot Meals for The Kids…
  • abigwhale.info : ondoy-relief-drop-off-sites

Here are government and NGO sites with some info as well.

  • Philippine National Red Cross
  • DSWD
  • OWWA
  • RTVM

I know a hundred more bloggers and sites out there I don’t know about- doing the same thing. God bless them. Even if you can’t donate material items or you dont have specialized skills like doctors and nurses – you can help by spreading the word – checking the sites listed above and others. If you have anything to add to the list, please post a comment.

Thanks and Lets pray for the safety of those affected.

Added Oct 6, 2009

Here’s a site dedicated to the cause! Thanks goes to @Joel for sharing.
http://www.ketsanarelief.com/

These are times that I’m proud to be Filipino!
